user.title: API Configuration
user.description: Get your API key from the [x.ai website]({api_key_url}). The default API endpoint should work for most users.

data_description.prompt: Add optional instructions that will be appended to the default prompt.
data_description.api_endpoint: The URL of the API endpoint. The default is `https://api.x.ai/v1`.
data_description.chat_model: The chat model to use. Recommended: {recommended_chat_model}.
data_description.max_tokens: The maximum tokens to use. Recommended: {recommended_max_tokens}.
data_description.llm_hass_api: Enable classic Home Assistant LLM integration mode. When enabled, bypasses custom tag pipeline and uses standard tools directly.
